top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!

Before you even mentioned the attachment for the slow close rails I was thinking "man, push-to-open drawers would be slick". 

That gets my vote.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Love everything you've done so far. But your island really needs an overhang and bar stools on the open side. My two cents. Best of luck.
